name: No Hope For Bope
description:
Made in a weekend (roughly 16hrs) for the Ludum Dare 50 Compo.

Jam Theme: DELAY THE INEVITABLE

Backstory: Bope did a bad, therefore Bope is now in the instantaneously combustible dark matter beam pit. Its not looking good for Bope. Unless a little divine intervention manages to get him to the top!

Have him touch the green beam to spare him - at least for a little while.

Controls:

A/D - Move

Space - Jump

R - Restart/Start

Left Click/Drag - Move Blocks

Hints:

Use the environment to help you steady the blocks.

Extra Hint - It's not easy
